challenges.name: Bufferfly
challenges.desc:
We've been hunting the space goblins for quite some time now. However, we're still having some trouble identifying their leader. In our last mission, we found a mysterious-looking chest that we think might contain some useful information. Could you help us open it?

https://19.tghack.no/page/Pwntions%20tutorial

Mprotect is a very useful function that can be used to make areas of memory executable.

challenges.name: ParallelUniverseQuarantineSimulator
challenges.desc:
Your goal is to make them execute execve("/bin/sh", ...).
Some hints/clarifications: * if one of the processes crashes, you lose * the output is prefixed with an ID, either 0 or 1 * for example: 0: hello, world!\n

challenges.name: ParallelUniverseWarmup
challenges.desc:
Can you create shellcode that runs on x86 and x86_64 simultaneously? Read the flag in flag.txt. The following syscalls are allowed:

    open
    read
    write
    close
    exit_group
    mmap

challenges.name: TheBiohackerHerbariumService
challenges.desc: note: the service is running in a Ubuntu bionic docker container
